sourcesContent:
<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
export default {
  props: ["dialog", "card", "buttonLoader"],
  watch: {
    props: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newValue) {
        this.handleDialog = newValue.dialog;
        this.loader = newValue.buttonLoader;
      },
    },
  },

  setup(props, { emit }) {
    const handleDialog = ref(false);
    const loader = ref(false)


    function closeDialog() {
      emit("close-delete-popup", false);
    }
    // attach handle account API here
    function handleAccount(id) {
      loader.value = true;
      emit("handle-delete", { cardId: id, key: false, loader: loader.value });
    }

      return {
        handleDialog,
        loader,
        closeDialog,
        handleAccount
      }
    }
}

</script>
